text: Yasama spasta nisaniharu chan, jasamadhye e'uta ibrahimako ubhine sthala ho. Yasama jo pravesa gardacha, tyasale amana (santi) prapta gardacha. Manisaharumathi allahako haka cha ki jasale tyasa gharasam'ma pugne samathrya rakhdacha, tyasale haja (dharmika yatra) garos. Yadi kasaile yasa adesako palana gardaina bhane allaha pani usasita baru sansarabata nisprha cha
